Uses of Interface
BoardStyle

    • Uses of BoardStyle in <Unnamed>

      Classes in <Unnamed> that implement BoardStyle 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlueSteel
      This is a board style that displays greyish blue colors with rounded rectangles for most elements, as well as displaying a 2.5d shadow for some elements.
      class  Jungle
      This is a board style that displays greenish colors for the board elements
      Date Created: 11/22/2012
      Date Updated: 11/22/2012
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return BoardStyle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BoardStyle MancalaFrame.getCurrentStyle()
      Returns the current board style of the frame.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type BoardStyle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MancalaFrame.addBoardStyle(BoardStyle style)
      Adds the style to the frame's list of available board styles.
